The image of the Lincoln Memorial covere: 2. News outlets such as Fox News, CNN, and the Washington Times reported on the damage to the Lincoln Memorial, but they only mentioned graffiti on a wall in front of the memorial, not on the statue itself.
The National Park Service: responsible for the care of the Lincoln Memorial, tweeted an image of the damage caused by demonstrations, but it only showed graffiti at the bottom of the steps, far away from the statue.
